alert.note: Alert for Monroe; Ontario; Wayne (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 19 at 2:07PM EST until January 21 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. The heaviest snow will occur this afternoon, then again late tonight through Saturday night. * WHERE...Monroe, Wayne, and Ontario counties. The swath of heaviest snow through Saturday night will fall across far eastern portions of Monroe County on into western Wayne County along with northern and eastern portions of Ontario County. This includes Webster, Newark, Clifton Springs and Geneva. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult at times with snow covered roads and reduced visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute today.
info.instruction: Periods of snow will result in snow covered roads and limited visibilities. Slow down and use caution while driving. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
